mapper.update: update tbl_reader_types set reader_type_name = #{readerTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borrow_day = #{borrowDay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, borrow_number = #{borrowNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, continue_number = #{continueNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=REAL} where reader_type_id = #{readerTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select reader_type_id, reader_type_name, borrow_day, borrow_number, continue_number, deposit from tbl_reader_types where reader_type_id = #{readerTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select reader_type_id, reader_type_name, borrow_day, borrow_number, continue_number, deposit from tbl_reader_types
